name: PASTAssassin
description:
PASTAssassin tells the tale of Tony Tortellini, a part-time chef but also underground assassin working in the Mafia. However, Tony has a dream to become a star chef of Italy and working in the Mafia will not do. Using his cooking abilities, he will eliminate the mafia bosses of Italy, and become a Pa-Star.

If anything gets stuck hold R to restart. If restarting gets stuck refresh the page. Your levels are saved and you can hit Load Level anytime you come back.

INSTRUCTIONS
WASD - Move
Left Click - Shoot
Right Click - Melee
Shift - Dash
F - Open Cookbook
Q / E / 1 / 2 / 3 - Swap Weapons
R - Restart Stage / (In Title) Reset All Data

Music by Roccow
Sounds from OpenGameArt and mixkit
